detaileddescription.para: This class is used to store conviniently the data from reading the faster data. You can either treat data directly or write it in root trees
This class is used as an interface between the faster data and root.

listitem.para: To convert data to a raw root tree :
Hit hit; TTree * tree = new TTree("Nuball2","Nuball2"); FasterReader.setHit(&hit); hit.writting(tree); while(reader.Read()) { tree -> Fill(); }
To read this raw root tree :
hit.reading(tree); for (int hit = 0; hit<tree->GetEntries(); hit++) { do somethign with the hit ... }
